org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel.handlers
Class AeRestoreClassLoaderHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.axis.handlers.BasicHandler
      org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel.handlers.AeRestoreClassLoaderHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.axis.Handler, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeSetClassLoaderHandler
public class AeRestoreClassLoaderHandler
extends org.apache.axis.handlers.BasicHandler

This class restores the original classloader which was replaced with the services context classloader by org.activebpel.rt.tomcat.AeSetClassLoader.

See Also:
